an e-commerce platform, GAMEVIL, built with React using Shopify as a headless commerce. Designed the user interface (UI) with Figma and interacted with shopifyâ€™s graphql API to fetch and display products.

BLOG

QUIZ APP

A quiz single page application with vanilla javascript. Questions are loaded by making fetch request to the Open Trivia API. Leaderboard was implemented using Firebase Realtime Database.
